sn29.10:1.2: Ekamantam nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn29.10:1.3: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo, yena midhekacco kayassa bheda param marana opapatikanam naganam sahabyatam upapajjati”ti?
sn29.10:2.1: “Idha, bhikkhu, ekacco kayena dvayakari hoti, vacaya dvayakari, manasa dvayakari.
sn29.10:2.5: ‘aho vataham kayassa bheda param marana opapatikanam naganam sahabyatam upapajjeyyan’ti.
sn29.10:2.6: So kayassa bheda param marana opapatikanam naganam sahabyatam upapajjati.
sn29.10:2.7: Ayam kho, bhikkhu, hetu, ayam paccayo, yena midhekacco kayassa bheda param marana opapatikanam naganam sahabyatam upapajjati”ti.
